turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to order two small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mushroom and sausage on the first and

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ham and pepperoni on the second.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 2 small pizzas, one mushroom and sausage, one ham and pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $26, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it for me. Thank you.
